cottage_1.header: Click on a Clearing and then click Erect under Cottages.
cottage_1.desc: Cottages shelter citizens. Erect them now so that you may gather more citizens to help you do construction work.

cottage_2.header: In your city, click on Cottages Lv 1, and click "Upgrade". If the Upgrade button is grey, that means you still have to meet certain requirements for Upgrade.
cottage_2.desc: Cottages shelter citizens. Erect and upgrade Cottages to boost Population Capacity, and make Idle Population available to fill the Required Workers job position in resource fields (Farm, Sawmill, Quarry, and Iron Mine). Upgrade your Cottages to level 2 to attract more people to reside in your city.

cottage_3.header: Find Cottages in your city and upgrade them to level 3.
cottage_3.desc: Cottages shelter citizens. Erect and upgrade Cottages to boost Population Capacity, and make Idle Population available to fill the Required Workers job position in resource fields (Farm, Sawmill, Quarry, and Iron Mine). Upgrade your Cottages to level 3 to attract more people to reside in your city.

store_1.header: Click on a Clearing and then click Erect under Warehouse. If the Erect requirement is met, the Erect button is functional; otherwise, it's shaded in gray.
store_1.desc: Your city is blooming and resources are flooding in. Increase your Warehouse Storage Capacity so that it can protect your resources from Maraud.

store_2.header: In your city, click on a level 1 "Warehouse", and then click "Upgrade". If the upgrade requirement is met, the Upgrade button is functional; otherwise, it's shaded in gray.
store_2.desc: Your Warehouse has been erected, but it is not likely to be sufficient. Upgrade your Warehouse so that your resources produced by the resource fields have a place to be stored. Warehouse protects your resources from Maraud.

store_3.header: In your city, select Warehouse, and upgrade it to level 3.
store_3.desc: Your Warehouse has been erected, but it is not likely to be sufficient. Upgrade your Warehouse so that your resources produced by the resource fields have a place to be stored. Warehouse protects your resources from Maraud.

palace_2.header: Click on "Rectorate", and then click "Upgrade". If the Upgrade button is grey, that means you still have to meet certain requirements for Upgrade.
palace_2.desc: Your city is flourishing. Bravo! You can get further ahead by upgrading the Rectorate now. You will be allowed to build more and build faster! You can expand your city and get 4 more Clearings on which to erect buildings upon the Rectorate reaching level 4, 8 and 10.

palace_3.header: Click on "Rectorate", and then click "Upgrade". If the Upgrade button is grey, that means you still have to meet certain requirements for Upgrade.
palace_3.desc: Your city is flourishing. Bravo! You can get further ahead by upgrading the Rectorate now. You will be allowed to build more and build faster! You can expand your city and get 4 more Clearings on which to erect buildings upon the Rectorate reaching level 4, 8 and 10.

palace_4.header: Click on "Rectorate", and then click "Upgrade". If the Upgrade button is grey, that means you still have to meet certain requirements for Upgrade.
palace_4.desc: Your city is flourishing. Nice job! You can advance by upgrading the Rectorate now. You will be allowed to build more and build faster! Your city has the chance to expand every time the Rectorate reaches level 4, 8 and 10!

palace_8.desc: Your city is flourishing. Nice job! You can advance by upgrading the Rectorate now. You will be allowed to build more and build faster! Your city has the chance to expand upon the Rectorate reaching level 4, 8, and 10!

palace_10.desc: Your city is flourishing. Nice job! You can advance by upgrading the Rectorate now. You will be allowed to build more and build faster! Your city has the chance to expand upon the Rectorate reaching level 4, 8, and 10!

pop_1.header: Erect and upgrade Cottages until Population Capacity reaches 500.
pop_1.desc: Your internal management is improving and you could certainly use more help from more loyal citizens!

pop_2.header: Erect and upgrade Cottages until Population Capacity reaches 5000.
pop_2.desc: Your internal management skill is amazing and you could certainly use more help from more loyal citizens!

pop_3.header: Erect and upgrade Cottages until Population Capacity reaches 50000.
pop_3.desc: Your city is thriving. Yet you will need more buildings and resources for people to immigrate to your cities. Once your city's Population Capacity reaches 50000, it will become a metropolis!

pop_4.header: Erect and upgrade Cottages until Population Capacity reaches 50000.
pop_4.desc: Your city is thriving. Yet you will need more buildings and resources for people to immigrate to your cities. Once your city's Population Capacity reaches 50000, it will become a metropolis!

jop_1.header: Click on a Clearing and then click Erect under Cottages.
jop_1.desc: Cottages shelter citizens. Erect them now so that you may gather more citizens to help you do construction work.

jop_2.header: In your city, select resource fields (Farm, Sawmill, Quarry and Iron Mine), and creates 50 Jobs for each of them.
jop_2.desc: You have built quite a few infrastructures but some of your citizens are still idling. Clearly you should put more Idle Population to work! Tune up the Target Job Occupancy Rate (TJOR) in "Production Performance" of Rectorate. Creating more Jobs in the resource fields (Farm, Sawmill, Quarry, and Iron Mine).

farm_2.header: In your city, select Farms, and upgrade it to level 2.
farm_2.desc: City is expanding. Everyone needs to eat. Crops is indespensible in every aspect of the city life. The higher level of your Farm, the faster Crops are grown and the more Husbandry Job it can create, one at a time, on each request.

wood_2.header: In your city, select Sawmill, and upgrade it to level 2.
wood_2.desc: Lumber is an essential part for buildings of all sorts and all the more important for military purposes. The higher the level of Sawmill, the faster Lumber is

uni_1.header: Click on a Clearing and then click Erect under University. If the Erect requirement is met, the Erect button is functional; otherwise, it's shaded in gray.
uni_1.desc: The University develops technologies that speed up constructions. The higher the level of University, the higher level of technologies you can study and the faster they will be finished.

uni_2.header: In your city, click on "University", and click "Upgrade". If the Upgrade button is grey, that means you still have to meet certain requirements for Upgrade.
uni_2.desc: The University develops technologies that speed up constructions. The higher the level of University, the higher level of technologies you can study and the faster they will be finished.

acad_1.header: Click on a Clearing and then click Erect under "Academy". If the Erect requirement is met, the Erect button is functional; otherwise, it's shaded in gray.
acad_1.desc: The Academy specializes in developing technologies for military purposes. The higher the level of the Academy, the higher the level of technologies you can study and the faster they will be finished.

wall_1.header: Click on Wall Lv 0, and click on Erect under"Wall". If the Erect requirement is met, the Erect button is functional; otherwise, it's shaded in gray.
wall_1.desc: You have pretty much everything except a city Wall. Wall requires large number of Stone so work hard to create more Gemology jobs. You may plant all sorts of fortifications on your Wall to guard your city against invasions.

wall_2.header: In your city, Click on Wall Lv 1, and click "Upgrade". If the Upgrade button is grey, that means you still have to meet certain requirements for Upgrade.
wall_2.desc: Walls offer tremendous military protection through boosting the defenses of troops within the city, offering space to plant fortifications, and simply acting as a barrier to invaders. The higher the level of your Wall, the stronger your defense mechanisms are!

theat_1.header: Click on a Clearing and then click Erect under Amphitheatre. If the Erect requirement is met, the Erect button is functional; otherwise, it's shaded in gray.
theat_1.desc: Talents are rare and you need help from capable heroes. Erect Amphitheatre to attract heroes for recruitment. The higher the level of Amphitheatre, the more heroes of higher level show up for you!

theat_2.header: In your city, click on Amphitheatre Lv 2, and click "Upgrade".
theat_2.desc: Upgrade Your Amphitheatre to increase the odds of finding rare talents. Reward them with handsome gifts to boost their loyalty. The higher the level of Amphitheatre, the more high-level heroes will show up for you!

theat_3.header: In your city, click on Amphitheatre Lv 3, and click "Upgrade".
theat_3.desc: Upgrade Your Amphitheatre to increase the odds of finding rare talents. Reward them with handsome gifts to boost their loyalty. The higher the level of Amphitheatre, the more high-level heroes will show up for you!

worship_1.header: Click on a Clearing and then click Erect at Temple. If the Erect requirement is met, the Erect button is functional; otherwise, it's shaded in gray.
worship_1.desc: Temple is an icon for Roman religion where you worship god to receive special enhancement and collect resources. Appease Criticism can increase citizens' Allegiance.

worship_2.header: In your city, click on "Temple", and click "Upgrade". If the Upgrade button is grey, that means you still have to meet certain requirements for Upgrade.
worship_2.desc: Temple is an icon for Roman religion where you can pacify your citizens and collect resources from them. Different gods and goddesses add different boosts to your production. The higher the level of your Temple, the greater production boost you can receive.

worship_3.header: In your city, select Temple, and upgrade it to level 3.
worship_3.desc: Temple is an icon for Roman religion. Different gods or goddesses add different boosts to your production. The higher the level of your Temple, the greater production boost you can receive.

barracks_1.header: Click on a Clearing and then click Erect under "Barracks". If Erect is grey, that means you still have to meet certain requirements in order to begin construction.
barracks_1.desc: Barracks train Hastatus, Sagittarii and Principes. Some types of infantry need to have a Barracks of high level to be trained. You can erect more than one Barracks in your city. Dismissal of infantry is also conducted in Barracks.

barracks_2.header: In your city, click on level 1 "Barrack", and click "Upgrade". If the upgrade requirement is met, the Upgrade button is functional; otherwise, it's shaded in gray.
barracks_2.desc: Barracks train infantry: Hastatus, Sagittarii and Principes. The higher its level, the more advanced level of infantry you can train and the more training queues allowed.

barracks_3.desc: Barracks train infantry: Hastatus, Sagittarii and Principes. The higher its level, the more advanced level of infantry you can train and the more training queues allowed.
barracks_3.header: In your city, select Barrack, and upgrade it to level 3.

barracks_4.desc: Barracks train infantry: Hastatus, Sagittarii and Principes. The higher its level, the more advanced level of infantry you can train and the more training queues allowed.
barracks_4.header: In your city, select Barrack, and upgrade it to level 4.

barracks_5.desc: Barracks train infantry: Hastatus, Sagittarii and Principes. The higher its level, the more advanced level of infantry you can train and the more training queues allowed.
barracks_5.header: In your city, select Barrack, and upgrade it to level 5.

barracks_6.desc: Barracks train infantry: Hastatus, Sagittarii and Principes. The higher its level, the more advanced level of infantry you can train and the more training queues allowed.

barracks_8.desc: Barracks train infantry: Hastatus, Sagittarii and Principes. The higher its level, the more advanced level of infantry you can train and the more training queues allowed.

barracks_10.desc: Barracks train infantry: Hastatus, Sagittarii and Principes. The higher its level, the more advanced level of infantry you can train and the more training queues allowed.

stabl_1.header: Click on a Clearing and then click Erect under "Stable". If Erect is grey, that means you still have to meet certain requirements in order to begin construction.
stabl_1.desc: Stable trains horsemen: Speculatore and Equites. The higher its level, the faster they finish training. You can erect more than one Stable in your city. Dismissal of horsemen is also conducted here.

stabl_2.header: In your city, click on level 1 "Stable", and click "Upgrade". If the upgrade requirement is met, the Upgrade button is functional; otherwise, it's shaded in gray.
stabl_2.desc: The Stable trains Speculatores and Equites. The higher its level, the faster they finish training and the more training queues allowed.

stabl_3.header: In your city, select Stable, and upgrade it to level 3.
stabl_3.desc: The Stable trains Speculatores and Equites. The higher its level, the faster they finish training and the more training queues allowed.

stabl_4.header: In your city, select Stable, and upgrade it to level 4.
stabl_4.desc: The Stable trains Speculatores and Equites. The higher its level, the faster they finish training and the more training queues allowed.

stabl_5.header: In your city, select Stable, and upgrade it to level 5.
stabl_5.desc: The Stable trains Speculatores and Equites. The higher its level, the faster they finish training and the more training queues allowed.

stabl_6.header: In your city, select Stable, and upgrade it to level 6
stabl_6.desc: The Stable trains Speculatores and Equites. The higher its level, the faster they finish training and the more training queues allowed.

stabl_7.header: In your city, select Stable, and upgrade it to level 7.
stabl_7.desc: The Stable trains Speculatores and Equites. The higher its level, the faster they finish training and the more training queues allowed.

stabl_8.header: In your city, select Stable, and upgrade it to level 8.
stabl_8.desc: The Stable trains Speculatores and Equites. The higher its level, the faster they finish training and the more training queues allowed.

stabl_9.header: In your city, select Stable, and upgrade it to level 9.
stabl_9.desc: The Stable trains Speculatores and Equites. The higher its level, the faster they finish training and the more training queues allowed.

stabl_10.header: In your city, select Stable, and upgrade it to level 10.
stabl_10.desc: The Stable trains Speculatores and Equites. The higher its level, the faster they finish training and the more training queues allowed.

workshop_1.header: Click on a Clearing and then click Erect under "Workshop". If Erect is grey, that means you still have to meet certain requirements in order to begin construction.
workshop_1.desc: Workshop manufactures siege engines: Ballistae and Onagers. The higher its level, the faster the siege engines are manufactured and more can be processed, one at a time, per request. You can Erect more than one Workshop in a city. Dismissal of siege engines is also conducted here.

workshop_2.header: In your city, click on level 1 "Workshop", and click "Upgrade". If the upgrade requirement is met, the Upgrade button is functional; otherwise, it's shaded in gray.
workshop_2.desc: Workshop is a place to manufacture siege weapons such as Ballistae and Onagers. The higher its level, the faster the weapons are finished and the larger the manufacturing queues may be allowed.

workshop_3.desc: Workshop is a place to manufacture siege weapons such as Ballistae and Onagers. The higher its level, faster the weapons are finished and the larger the manufacturing queues may be allowed.
workshop_3.header: In your city, select Workshop, and upgrade it to level 3.

workshop_4.desc: Workshop is a place to manufacture siege weapons such as Ballistae and Onagers. The higher its level, faster the weapons are finished and the larger the manufacturing queues may be allowed.
workshop_4.header: In your city, select Workshop, and upgrade it to level 4.

workshop_5.header: In your city, select Workshop, and upgrade it to level 5.
workshop_5.desc: Workshop is a place to manufacture siege weapons such as Ballistae and Onagers. The higher its level, faster the weapons are finished and the larger the manufacturing queues may be allowed.

workshop_6.header: In your city, select Workshop, and upgrade it to level 6.
workshop_6.desc: Workshop is a place to manufacture siege weapons such as Ballistae and Onagers. The higher its level, faster the weapons are finished and the larger the manufacturing queues may be allowed.

workshop_7.header: In your city, select Workshop, and upgrade it to level 7.
workshop_7.desc: Workshop is a place to manufacture siege weapons such as Ballistae and Onagers. The higher its level, faster the weapons are finished and the larger the manufacturing queues may be allowed.

workshop_8.header: In your city, select Workshop, and upgrade it to level 8.
workshop_8.desc: Workshop is a place to manufacture siege engines: Ballistae and Onagers. The higher its level, faster the weapons are finished and the larger the manufacturing queues may be allowed.

workshop_9.header: In your city, select Workshop, and upgrade it to level 9.
workshop_9.desc: Workshop is a place to manufacture siege weapons such as Ballistae and Onagers. The higher its level, faster the weapons are finished and the larger the manufacturing queues may be allowed.

workshop_10.header: In your city, select Workshop, and upgrade it to level 10.
workshop_10.desc: Workshop is a place to manufacture siege engines: Ballistae and Onagers. The higher its level, faster the weapons are finished and the larger the manufacturing queues may be allowed.

prom_1.header: You can be granted a promotion once the requirement on Sesterces and luxury items is met. Required Sesterces and luxury items will be deducted on accepting the quest rewards.
prom_1.desc: The Curia as well as all walks of life are satisfied with the way you are running your city. Once you have enough Prestige you will be promoted to a higher noble rank. With a rank promotion you must give away Sesterces and luxury items to throw a big banquet of celebration!

prom_29.desc: The Curia as well as all walks of life are satisfied with the way you are running your city. Once you have enough Prestige you will be promoted to a higher noble rank. With a rank promotion you must give away Sesterces and luxury items to throw a big banquet of celebration!

lucky.header: Every player gets a free Zodiac Goat upon login daily. Drop by daily to claim your share of the Zodiac Goat fortune!
lucky.desc: A Zodiac Goat is a necessary item during Zodiac Ceremony. By offering a Zodiac Goat to god, you will be duly rewarded. Good luck and have fun with your Zodiac Ceremony!

t_map.header: Gather a treasure map every day you login.
t_map.desc: People from around the neighboring regions are coming in and out of the major cities to trade. Merchants travel, and they are the conduits for the oil of all human society, gossip. Gossip carries new information and messages about the rumor of treasure map: where to get it, how to get it, and who's holding it, etc. City lord grasps every opportunity and sends trusted servants to examine the validity of these claims.

repel_trumpet.header: When the Roman Republic is under attack by the Fearless Skullbearer and the rebel army, Carthage people launch an armed resistance. You now have a chance to fight for the Roman Republic, gain glory and exploit!
repel_trumpet.desc: You will be rewarded free Sample Repression Horn upon your daily login. Use it or Repression Horn to launch wars towards Carthage Revolt and Carthage Thugs ( Pink dots ) on the world map. By defeating Carthage Revolt, you will be rewarded with some new items.

copper_medal.desc: Consuming Copper Medal get the effect of educating heroes and improve their battle capability.

exp_map.header: Use 10 Treasure Maps to barter for 1 Vitruvius Plot.
exp_map.desc: Once you gather enough Treasure Maps, you want to get the most out of them. But you may lack the time to actually go examine the sites. The fact is that there's no guarantee any of the maps can bring you wealth and prosperity. Why not get rid of them? From time to time, some merchants are willing to barter with you for 10 Treasure Maps. In return, you'll get 1 Vitruvius Plot.

army_s_1.header: Barter 5 Gray Rebel Aglets for a Gray Package.
army_s_1.desc: The Senate bestow a Gray Package upon the lord for quelling the rebellion during activity.

army_s_3.ar_title: Barter For Mini Pack of Captives
army_s_3.header: Barter 20 Gray Rebel Aglets for 3 Mini Packs of Captives.
army_s_3.desc: Defeat the rebels in a wilderness of level 1-3. The local peasants send you a Gray Rebel Aglet to express their gratitude. Bring the aglets back to the senators. They will authorize more military forces to be at your disposal.

army_m_1.header: Tip: Only each round of player Rank 1 in arena can get King Medal.
army_m_1.desc: Only the king of Arena can get reward, after complete quest, you still get 50,000 prestige and 50,000 honor.

army_m_3.header: Barter 20 Yellow Rebel Aglets for 2 Black WSC Passes.
army_m_3.desc: The senate issues Black War Simulation Colosseum (WSC) Passes to the lords who are eligible to participate in the war simulation. You can exchange 20 Yellow Rebel Aglets for 2 Black WSC Passes to ensure your eligibility to participate in the war simulation.

army_l_1.header: Tip: Only each round of player Rank 1 in arena can get King Medal.
army_l_1.desc: Only the king of Arena can get reward, after complete quest, you still get 100,000 prestige and 100,000 honor.

army_l_3.ar_title: Barter For Large Pack of Captives
army_l_3.header: Barter 20 Purple Rebel Aglets for 3 Large Packs of Captives.
army_l_3.desc: Defeat the rebels in a wilderness of level 8-10. The local peasants send you a Purple Rebel Aglet to express their gratitude. Bring the aglets back to the senators. They will authorize more military forces to be at your disposal.

m1_x20.ar_title: Barter for a Black WSC Pass
m1_x20.header: Barter 20 Gray Rebel Aglets for 1 Black WSC Pass.
m1_x20.desc: The senate issues Black War Simulation Colosseum (WSC) Passes to the lord who's eligible to participate in the war simulation. You can exchange 20 Gray Rebel Aglets for a Black War Pass to ensure your eligibility to participate in the war simulation.

m2_x20.header: Barter 20 Yellow Rebel Aglets for 2 Black WSC Passes.
m2_x20.desc: The senate issues Black War Simulation Colosseum (WSC) Passes to the lords who are eligible to participate in the war simulation. You can exchange 20 Yellow Rebel Aglets for 2 Black WSC Passes to ensure your eligibility to participate in the war simulation.

m3_x20.header: Barter 20 Purple Rebel Aglets for 5 Black WSC Passes.
m3_x20.desc: The senate issues Black War Simulation Colosseum (WSC) Passes to the lords who are eligible to participate in the war simulation. You can exchange 20 Purple Rebel Aglets for 5 Black WSC Passes to ensure your eligibility to participate in the war simulation.

mr_x10.header: Barter 10 Red WSC Passes for 5 Black WSC Passes.
mr_x10.desc: The senate issues Black War Simulation Colosseum (WSC) Passes to the lords who are eligible to participate in the war simulation. You can exchange 10 Red WSC Passes for 5 Black WSC Passes to ensure your eligibility to participate in the war simulation.

mr_x2.header: Barter 2 Red WSC Passes for 1 Sirloin.
mr_x2.desc: The senate caters for the lord who brings them 2 Red WSC Passes.

mr_x4.header: Barter 4 Red WSC Passes for 1 Large Pack of Captives.
mr_x4.desc: The senate bestows troops on the lord for bringing them 4 Red WSC Passes.

mr_x300.header: Barter 300 Red WSC Passes for a hero with 8 POT.
mr_x300.desc: The senate assigns a hero to you for bringing them 300 Red WSC Passes.

mb_x1.header: Acquire Black War Simulation Colosseum (WSC) Pass.
mb_x1.desc: The senate are looking for high ranking noble lords to actively participate in the war simulation, resisting the rebels.

pres_20k.header: When your Noble Rank and the amount of Emblems you own meet requirement, you can barter for Quest reward. Note that the bartered Emblems will be taken off after you accept the reward.
pres_20k.desc: The rebel forces are expanding to surrounding areas rapidly and committing  all manners of crimes. To protect Republic, the lord should wipe out these rebel forces. The lords can participate in war against the rebel cities by consuming a Black WSC Pass. By collecting enough Emblems, you can get handsome Quest reward. You will be awarded 20,000 Prestige by completing this Quest.

pres_80k.header: When your Noble Rank and the amount of Emblems you own meet requirement, you can barter for Quest reward. Note that the bartered Emblems will be taken off after you accept the reward.
pres_80k.desc: The rebel forces are expanding to surrounding areas rapidly and committing  all manners of crimes. To protect Republic, the lord should wipe out these rebel forces. The lords can participate in war against the rebel cities by consuming a Black WSC Pass. By collecting enough Emblems, you can get handsome Quest reward. You will be awarded 80,000 Prestige by completing this Quest.

union_era.header: When the amount of Emblems you own meet requirement, you can barter for Quest reward. Note that the bartered Emblems will be taken off after you accept the reward.
union_era.desc: The rebel forces are expanding to surrounding areas rapidly and committing  all manners of crimes. To protect Republic, the lord should wipe out these rebel forces. The lords can participate in war against the rebel cities by consuming a Black WSC Pass. By collecting enough Emblems, you can get handsome Quest reward. You will be awarded 1 Union League Covenant by completing this Quest.

free_help.header: When the amount of Emblems you own meet requirement, you can barter for Quest reward. Note that the bartered Emblems will be taken off after you accept the reward.
free_help.desc: The rebel forces are expanding to surrounding areas rapidly and committing  all manners of crimes. To protect Republic, the lord should wipe out these rebel forces. The lords can participate in war against the rebel cities by consuming a Black WSC Pass. By collecting enough Emblems, you can get handsome Quest reward. You will be awarded 1 Divine Liberty by completing this Quest.

motiv_60.desc: Timely and immediate repair work for your fortifications keeps them alive and functional. Reparation can boost your fortifications' revival rate, so that more of them may revive after their destruction.

helper_chng.desc: Timely and immediate repair work for your fortifications keeps them alive and functional. Reparation can boost your fortifications' revival rate, so that more of them may revive after their destruction.

pres_5k.header: Trade 2 Red WSC Passes with 1 Macedon Emblem for 5,000 Prestige
pres_5k.desc: Rewards for the bravest and brightest.

pres_50k.desc: Rewards for the bravest and brightest.

pres_100k.desc: Rewards for the bravest and brightest.

pres_400k.desc: Rewards for the bravest and brightest.

pres_500k.desc: Rewards for the bravest and brightest.

loy_boot.desc: To prevent the expansion of the Rebel, the Senate bestow Loyal Equipment as reward in battle achievement. By collecting enough Emblems, you can get handsome Quest reward. You will be awarded a Loyal Shield by completing this Quest.

loy_shield.desc: To prevent the expansion of the Rebel, the Senate bestow Loyal Equipment as reward in battle achievement. By collecting enough Emblems, you can get handsome Quest reward. You will be awarded a Loyal Shield by completing this Quest.

loy_helmet.desc: To prevent the expansion of the Rebel, the Senate bestow Loyal Equipment as reward in battle achievement. By collecting enough Emblems, you can get handsome Quest reward. You will be awarded a Loyal Shield by completing this Quest.

loy_armor.desc: To prevent the expansion of the Rebel, the Senate bestow Loyal Equipment as reward in battle achievement. By collecting enough Emblems, you can get handsome Quest reward. You will be awarded a Loyal Shield by completing this Quest.

loy_sword.header: Loyal Sword: Damage +3, Offense +4, Technique: Rain of Arrows.
loy_sword.desc: To prevent the expansion of the Rebel, the Senate bestow Loyal Equipment as reward in battle achievement. By collecting enough Emblems, you can get handsome Quest reward. You will be awarded a Loyal Sword by completing this Quest.

lion_boot.ar_title: Barter Emblem(s) and Dye for Lion Boots
lion_boot.desc: A pair of boots is bestowed by Lion for your bringing his lost emblem back through thick and thin.

lion_shield.ar_title: Barter Emblem(s) and Spices for Lion Shield
lion_shield.desc: A shield is bestowed by Lion for your bringing his lost emblem back through thick and thin.

lion_helmet.ar_title: Barter Emblem(s) and Wine for Lion Helmet
lion_helmet.desc: A helmet is bestowed by Lion for you bringing his lost emblem back through thick and thin.

lion_armor.ar_title: Barter Emblem(s) and Wool for Lion Armor
lion_armor.header: Lion Armor: HP+32, Defense +12, Technique: Testudo.
lion_armor.desc: A piece of armor is bestowed by Lion for your bringing his lost emblem back through thick and thin.

lion_sword.ar_title: Barter Emblem(s) and Silk for Lion Sword
lion_sword.desc: A sword is bestowed by Lion for your bringing his lost emblem back through thick and thin.

fearless_boot.ar_title: Barter Emblem(s) and Furs for Fearlessness Boots
fearless_boot.desc: Fighting hard to crush the rebellion, you will be rewarded a piece of Fearlessness Armor for protecting Roman empire.

fearless_shield.ar_title: Barter Emblem(s) and Furs for Fearlessness Shield
fearless_shield.desc: Fighting hard to crush the rebellion, you will be rewarded a piece of Fearlessness Armor for protecting Roman empire.

fearless_helmet.ar_title: Barter Emblem(s) and Incense for Fearlessness Helmet
fearless_helmet.desc: Fighting hard to crush the rebellion, you will be rewarded a piece of Fearlessness Armor for protecting Roman empire.

fearless_armor.ar_title: Barter Emblem(s) and Ivory for Fearlessness Armor
fearless_armor.header: Fearlessness Armor: HP +60, Defense +20, Technique: Testudo.
fearless_armor.desc: Fighting hard to crush the rebellion, you will be rewarded a piece of Fearlessness Armor for protecting Roman empire.

fearless_sword.ar_title: Barter Emblem(s) and Diamond for Fearlessness Sword
fearless_sword.desc: Fighting hard to crush the rebellion, you will be rewarded a Fearlessness Sword for protecting Roman Empire.

mili_boot.desc: Forged by Vulcan, let hero own more powerful strength to fight the Rebel. Only the powerful lords can get.

mili_shield.desc: Forged by Vulcan, let hero own more powerful strength to fight the Rebel. Only the powerful lords can get.
